text:
September 7, 1967
Honorable Bob Wilson
House of Representatives
Rayburn Office Building
Washington, D. C. 20515
Dear Mr. Wilsons
I understand that Ernie 0fByrne has corresponded with
you recently about the College’s interest in the Public
Broadcasting Act#
Should you wish to discuss the subject further, I can
be available at your convenience Thursday or Friday#
I am staying at the Sheraton Park, but I have arranged
to have calls taken at the office of Mr. Sandler at
the National Association of Educational Broadcasters,
667-6000.
As you know, we believe the Bill will greatly aid our
work in San Diego and the proper growth of Educational
Broadcasting nationally. We hope you will support it.
Sincerely,
JPWslkl
John P. Witherspoon
General Manager, KEBS—TV—FM
San Diego State College
